channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How egg prices became a symbol of Americans’ economic anxiety
Where are the opportunities now in the muni-bond market? Tune in at noon EDT.
The crypto market continues to stumble as Trump declines to rule out potential recession this year
item.description: Trump tells Fox News that the country will experience a “period of transition.”

item.title: These 4 ‘M’s’ are the key to successful aging, expert reveals
item.description: “I’d like people to anticipate their future with some level of comfort.”

item.title: Market volatility gauge ‘VIX’ is at its highest level of the year
Trump Gaza AI video creators say they intended for it to be satire and don’t know how Trump found it
item.description: An AI-generated video of Trump's vision for Gaza went viral after the president shared it on social media without context.

item.title: Former Twitch’s CEO words of warning to Gen Z interns: Prestigious jobs on paper are ‘mostly a trap’ and money is a ‘constraint’
item.description: Emmett Shear warns interns that starting a business will bring "economy-sized" pain, but joining the workforce is full of traps.

item.title: Nasdaq drops over 3%, S&P 500 tumbles 2% as tariff policies stoke slowdown fears
These 13 growth stocks are expected to roar back from 2025’s declines
China’s six-year-olds are already being offered AI classes in school in a bid to train the next generation of DeepSeek founders
item.description: Other countries like Estonia, England, Canada, South Korea, and America are training students on how to use AI too.
